node.title: Anaesthetics team missed 'constellation of signs' leading to death of 19-mth-old girl
node.alt: Port Macquarie Base Hospital, emergency entrance to the building.
node.description: A coronial inquest has found the death of a 19-month-old girl at Port Macquarie Base hospital two years ago could have been prevented.
node.content:
["A coronial inquest has found the death of a 19-month-old girl at Port Macquarie Base hospital two years ago could've been prevented.\u00a0", "In February of 2019, a Sydney family was holidaying in\u00a0Port Macquarie when\u00a0their daughter was accidentally\u00a0bitten on the finger\u00a0by a black cockatoo after placing her hand inside a bird enclosure at a local wildlife park.", "She was taken\u00a0to Port Macquarie Base Hospital for treatment, where medical staff decided surgery was appropriate.", "Doctors decided to perform the surgery under general anaesthetic with an\u00a0endotracheal tube (ETT)\u00a0\u2014\u00a0a\u00a0flexible plastic tube that is placed\u00a0into the trachea (windpipe) to maintain an open airway.", "Deputy State Coroner Magistrate Derek Lee said it was found the ETT was incorrectly placed into the\u00a0oesophagus.", "\"The oesophageal intubation [incorrectly placed ETT]\u00a0resulted in sudden deterioration of the girl's condition,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"Her heart rate and oxygen saturations decreased to precariously low levels and she went into cardiac arrest.", "
A preventable death
", "Coroner Lee said there were a number of signs indicating the ETT had been place incorrectly, but staff failed to recognise them.", "\u00a0\"A constellation of signs ... ought to have alerted the members of the anaesthetic team to both the First ETT and Second ETT being in the oesophagus, rather than the trachea,\" the coroner said.", "However, Coroner Lee acknowledged the medical team could have missed their mistake due to the\u00a0challenging environment they were in,\u00a0with a patient that was clinically deteriorating.", "He said the team thought of multiple other causes for the girl's deterioration.\u00a0", "\"The anaesthetic team became anchored in their thinking and fixated upon other reversible causes of her\u00a0deterioration,\" he said.", "Coroner Lee also found the Wildlife Park bore no blame for the injury.", "\"The available evidence did not identify any issues associated with warning signage or fencing relating to the bird enclosure at the park that directly contributed to the accident,\" he said.", "
Health district sorry
", "Mid North Coast Local Health District Chief Executive Stewart Dowrick said the organisation offers its sincere condolences to the victim's family\u00a0and apologises for the tragic incident which occurred two years ago.", "In a statement, Mr Dowrick said since the incident, appropriate measures have been\u00a0put in place at Port Macquarie Base Hospital to help prevent another tragedy of this kind.", "Coroner Lee said the hospital has also established a support network with a tertiary paediatric facility, to train staff and develop appropriate\u00a0clinical skills.", "\"Such a network provides support for simulation training ...\u00a0some of which seeks to address the challenges faced by clinicians on 4 February, 2019, and provide for improved outcomes.", "The family wanted to keep their loss private and remain anonymous.\u00a0"]
